source: RISC-V Privileged ISA Specification v1.13, Chapter 3, Section 3.1.6

parameters.name: SD
parameters.description: State Dirty bit summarizing whether FS, XS, or VS indicate dirty state
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly named field with defined semantics; dependency on F or V extension explicitly stated

parameters.name: MDT
parameters.description: Machine Disable Trap control bit for double-trap handling
parameters.reasoning: Named field that only exists when Smdbltrp extension is implemented

parameters.name: MPELP
parameters.description: Machine Previous Expected Landing Pad state
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly named field added by Zicfilp extension

parameters.name: MPV
parameters.reasoning: Field only exists in RV64 when H extension is implemented

parameters.name: GVA
parameters.description: Guest Virtual Address indicator for traps
parameters.reasoning: Explicit dependency on RV64 and H extension stated

parameters.name: MBE
parameters.reasoning: Named field that exists only in RV64 per specification

parameters.name: SBE
parameters.reasoning: Explicit dependency on RV64 and S extension

parameters.name: SXL
parameters.reasoning: Field only exists in RV64 and requires S extension

parameters.name: UXL
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly limited to RV64 with U extension

parameters.name: SDT
parameters.reasoning: Named field added by Smdbltrp extension

parameters.name: SPELP
parameters.description: Supervisor Previous Expected Landing Pad state
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly added by Zicfilp extension

parameters.name: TSR
parameters.reasoning: Named field requiring S extension

parameters.name: TW
parameters.reasoning: Explicit S-mode related dependency

parameters.name: TVM
parameters.reasoning: Requires S extension as stated

parameters.name: MXR
parameters.reasoning: Named field requiring S extension

parameters.name: SUM
parameters.reasoning: Explicit dependency on S extension

parameters.name: MPRV
parameters.description: Modify privilege for loads and stores
parameters.reasoning: Dependency on U extension explicitly stated

parameters.name: XS
parameters.reasoning: Named field always present but hardwired to zero in base spec

parameters.name: FS
parameters.reasoning: Explicit dependency stated in field description

parameters.name: MPP
parameters.reasoning: Core named field always present in mstatus

parameters.name: VS
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly requires vector support or S extension

parameters.name: SPP
parameters.reasoning: Only meaningful when S extension is implemented

parameters.name: MPIE
parameters.reasoning: Named core field with no conditional existence

parameters.name: UBE
parameters.reasoning: Dependency on U extension explicitly stated

parameters.name: SPIE
parameters.reasoning: Requires S extension per description

parameters.name: MIE
parameters.reasoning: Fundamental named interrupt-enable bit

parameters.name: SIE
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly requires S extension

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_62_48
parameters.reasoning: Marked as Reserved/WPRI with no official field name

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_47_43
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly listed as reserved in RV64 layout

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_40
parameters.reasoning: Single reserved bit with no name

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_31_25_RV64
parameters.reasoning: RV64-specific reserved region

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_30_25_RV32
parameters.reasoning: RV32-specific reserved region

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_4
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly marked reserved in both RV32 and RV64

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_2
parameters.reasoning: No defined functionality; must be preserved

parameters.name: MSTATUS_RESERVED_0
parameters.reasoning: Explicitly listed as reserved

notes: mstatush is treated as an RV32 alias for upper RV64 mstatus bits; parameters mapped accordingly. No dependencies were inferred beyond explicit statements in the text.
